attributes.action: All UK citizens to have a referendum vote on the breaking up of the UK
attributes.additional_details: The Scottish call for a referendum on splitting from the UK not only affects Scotland but affects all UK citizens, and we should all be able to have a say in this major change to our country after 300 years, not just the scottish people. It will affect all of us, economically, politically, socially, etc etc. Let us all have a vote, it should be our right in such a major decision
